frontMatter.title: RedLineStealer Information Stealer Analysis
frontMatter.summary: Redline malware is an Information Stealer written in c# , targeting windows victims. It is used for gathering victims information ranging from the Browser cookies, saved credentials, Discord tokens...

prev.title: RemcosRat infection chain from excel with Macros
prev.summary: RemcosRAT is a Fileless multi-stage malware that is distributed through malicious macros in Excel files. The malware enables remote administration of infected systems to perform unintended actions.

next.title: Analyzing Malware packets using gopackets Library
next.summary: Gopacket is a library developed by google that provides capabilities for decoding packets in Go language. It enables one to manually decode malware traffic packets easily.
